sub_features.name: LangSmith Tracing
sub_features.notes: Captures complete LLM prompts, outputs, parameters, and full execution traces

sub_features.name: Trace Preview Customization
sub_features.notes: Configure which parts of a trace's inputs and outputs appear directly in the tracing table

sub_features.name: Run Tree Visualization
sub_features.notes: Hierarchical visualization displaying parent-child spans, nested chains, and tool workflows

sub_features.name: Time-to-First-Token (TTFT) Monitoring
sub_features.notes: Tracks streaming latency metrics like TTFT, but lacks explicit real-time trace rendering

sub_features.name: Framework Integrations
sub_features.notes: Turnkey automatic trace collection for LangChain, LangGraph, and other frameworks without code changes

sub_features.name: Trace Filtering
sub_features.notes: Search and filter traces using custom metadata attributes, operational tags, and user feedback

sub_features.name: Token Usage Monitoring
sub_features.notes: Tracks input/output token usage with per-step attribution for high-volume spans

sub_features.name: RAG App Tracing
sub_features.notes: Logs vector DB queries and retrieved documents within the hierarchy, but lacks native chunk relevance scoring visualization

sub_features.name: Tool Call Interception
sub_features.notes: Parsed display of tool invocations, inputs, selected arguments, and return values in agent traces

sub_features.name: Agent Trajectory Graph
sub_features.notes: DAG visualization of agent loop components, tool selection choices, and workflow branches

sub_features.name: Intermediate Child Runs
sub_features.notes: Stores and provides inspection of intermediate chain-of-thought logic and iterative LLM tool calls

sub_features.name: Thread Tracing
sub_features.notes: Collects related runs representing multi-turn conversations for thread-scoped evaluation, but lacks full interactive replay capability

sub_features.name: Failure Debugging
sub_features.notes: Automatically flags and highlights failed steps, exceptions, and loops in an agent trace

sub_features.name: LangSmith MCP Server
sub_features.notes: Connects LangSmith to tools like Claude or VSCode for real-time querying of server logs and trace properties

sub_features.name: LLM-as-Judge Evaluators
sub_features.notes: GUI-supported building of LLM evaluators to configure custom criteria over traces or datasets

sub_features.name: Custom Evaluator Functions
sub_features.notes: User-defined custom scoring functions providing measurement logic for performance evaluations

sub_features.name: Datasets and Examples
sub_features.notes: Manage diverse evaluation datasets consisting of inputs, operational metadata, and reference outputs, with trace curation support

sub_features.name: Prompt Analytics
sub_features.notes: Allows analysis and comparison of prompt iterations, though automated suggestion routines like DSPy have no explicit native interface

sub_features.name: Offline Evaluations
sub_features.notes: Automatically execute evaluations strictly over defined offline examples to catch model generation regressions

sub_features.name: Compare Experiments
sub_features.notes: Provides parallel visual execution records to contrast varying prompt configurations explicitly

sub_features.name: Annotation Queues
sub_features.notes: A directed interface letting team experts review, judge systematically, and annotate inline spans over shared queries

sub_features.name: Online Evaluators
sub_features.notes: Applies evaluation heuristics asynchronously over streaming real traffic for production monitoring

sub_features.name: Custom Hallucination Evaluator
sub_features.notes: Can utilize LLM evaluator criteria strictly applied to detect hallucinations, but not an independent drop-in native guardrail

sub_features.name: Granular Usage Limits and Pricing
sub_features.notes: Cost tracking linked across separated environments tracking organizational attribution granularly via rules

sub_features.name: Token Dashboards
sub_features.notes: Visualizes breakdown of LLM interaction token bandwidth directly coupled to workspace performance

sub_features.name: Latency Distribution Metrics
sub_features.notes: Observes overall completion spans and percentiles, though lacks highly configured pure heatmaps explicitly

sub_features.name: Automated Alerts and Monitoring
sub_features.notes: Configurable anomaly thresholds paired with outgoing webhook notifications routing exceptions to DevOps

sub_features.name: Project Dashboard Analytics
sub_features.notes: Displays overarching evaluative distributions for workspaces limiting robust chart custom drag-and-drop metrics builder views

sub_features.name: Prompt Versioning
sub_features.notes: Allows defining version-controlled reference prompt texts although lacks completely externalized standalone deployment API routing endpoints

sub_features.name: Prompt Experimentation
sub_features.notes: Immediate simulation platform enabling dry-run evaluation on model parameter variations live

sub_features.name: Experiments Suite
sub_features.notes: Binds specific app variations over static dataset collections verifying relative score differences historically

sub_features.name: Prompt Revisions
sub_features.notes: Tracks structural history natively allowing parallel analysis, but explicit zero-latency rollback routing is not explicitly listed

sub_features.name: LangSmith SDKs
sub_features.notes: Fully supported across Python and JS/TS but lacks official SDK references natively resolving to Go modules

sub_features.name: Provider Integrations
sub_features.notes: Interacts smoothly tracing LangChain, LLamaIndex, CrewAI, Vercel AI SDK, and Pydantic AI applications natively

sub_features.name: Public API & Automations
sub_features.notes: Offers workspace API keys driving organization setups and robust configurable outbound hooks pushing alerts globally

sub_features.name: Offline Eval Triggering
sub_features.notes: Experiment scripts integrate gracefully blocking merge checks though avoids a provided dedicated proprietary GitHub workflow syntax

sub_features.name: Platform Hosting Models
sub_features.notes: Provided in public pure cloud, secured hybrid environments, or self-hosted VPCs entirely

sub_features.name: Regional Environments
sub_features.notes: Provides varying trust regions explicitly and supports enterprise data arrangements lacking strict documented automatic HIPAA defaults globally

sub_features.name: Workload Isolation & Identity Setup
sub_features.notes: Establishes robust Workspace isolation implementing workspace roles (RBAC) securely tied externally to corporate Single Sign-on (SSO) providers
